channel.title: Slovenia on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Slovenia on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Slovenia, December 2018
item.description: Some more musically inspired Christmas decorations on Levstik square The 'flancat' pastry and hot sweet herbal tea People in the UK won't really know about the sport performed here

item.title: A visit to Slovenia, October 2017
item.description: Haven’t been here for 10 months and have missed the place. Just look at the views.

item.title: Bohinj still rocks in the winter
item.description: An all time favourite hiking destination. Church of St. John the Baptist in Ribčev Laz Vrh nad Želimljami Vrh nad Želimljami View of Triglav from my easyJet flight back to London Stansted
